title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains how cool guys are overrated, Russell Wilson, Andrew Lick, & Tom Brady are corny guys because they show their emotions. Everyone on the Warriors should take a little less next year to keep Draymond Green, he's the bouncer for the team. Teams should make the cap space and go after Jimmy Garoppolo before it's too late and the Seahawks are going to have a rude awakening this year without Russell Wilson.

Guest: Greg Cosell

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
